longText.aboutMeDesc:
I am a 40 years old Web Developer from Weeze (Germany, North-Rhine-Westphalia) with experience in building web apps with JavaScript & Angular.
Always fascinated by the possibilities of modern web development I decided to turn my first knowledge of coding into the ability to create professional web-based applications in a team.
I have reached this goal in the past year with the Developer Akademie in Munich. During that time I have not only learned basic concepts of coding but also continously used this knowledge in countless exercise and projects.
These projects have been checked and approved by experienced Mentors.
This continuous process of learning and practical usage improved my coding abilities in the past months significantly.

Feel free to get a look into my collection of responsive websites and applications and convince yourself of my abilities.

skillCarousel.teamworkText: Experience in working in groups and basic knowledge of agile methods.
skillCarousel.userInterfaceText: Development of responsive applications by using CSS-Frameworks and UI-Libraries.
skillCarousel.asyncProgrammingText: Accessing database und REST-API using asynchronous methods and und RXJS concepts.
skillCarousel.complexAppsText: Very good at handling the requirements of complex applications by using a javascript framework.

projects.introText: This is where I present my most important web applications. Includes both apps for cooperative working in business or social context as well as an OOP-based Jump 'n' Run game.
projects.projManDesc: Easy task management according to Kanban. Create user-based projects and update the status with drag & drop. Includes NO SQL firestore with authentication for users and tasks.
projects.slackDesc: Inspired by 'Slack'. Includes common messaging functions like channel management und a thread-based comment system. Includes a firestore backend solution for users and thread management
projects.polloDesc: Prototype of a jump 'n' run game in Vanilla Javascript with focus on object-oriented programming. Help farmer Pepe to prevent his village from enemies.
projects.portfolioDesc: A personal introduction of myself and my abilities and ambitions as a frontend developer for your team.
